turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi. How are you? I'm chatting to you from Tennessee.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Howdy neighbor! I'm here in Alabama.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's a beautiful place. Many of my ancestors came from Alabama. How do you feel about children's charities? There are a lot of suffering children in the world.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I feel that they're good. I work at a Children's hospital so I see children suffering everyday.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I used to work at a Children's hospital too! In Chattanooga! Well I'm probably going to donate a portion of my earnings to the Save the Children charity They work globally and have are great reputation.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: What did you do there?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: At the children's hospital? I was a respiratory therapist. So the researcher will handle the donation and make sure it gets to the right people. Would you care to donate something as well?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would like to donate too. I'm a biomedical equipment technician at my hospital.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's awesome. I'm glad you're donating. Even if it is a small amount. The charity helps feed, educate, clothe and provide healthcare for kids. They are working with those poor babies in Syria that have suffered so much. How much do you feel you want to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm thinking .75 would help.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That sounds great to me. You can choose any amount between 0 to $2.00. Thank you for your compassion.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No problem. I agree that the defenseless need help.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I used to drive through Alabama delivering oxygen supplies to nursing homes. I would go to Huntsville, all the way to Gadsten. It's so beautiful. Sad that there are so many poverty stricken areas. Lots of needy kids there too, just like Tennessee. I love the south though.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I used to live in Huntsville and my mom's from Gadsden. Now I live in South Alabama between Gulf Shores and Mobile.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Oh lucky you! You're near the beach. I've been to Florida's beaches and South Carolina but not Alabama. I want to go. Heard it's very nice.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: They are pretty nice. I love it down here. Moving down here is one of the best decisions I've made.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Are you really close to the water? We don't get to the ocean too much. It's about a 9 or 10 hour drive from here. How cool, that you have a great job and an awesome place to live!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Where I'm at now I'm about 2 miles from the bay and about 45 mins from the Gulf. I just bought a house just north of here. I'll be an hour from the Gulf there.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It sounds wonderful. I'm sure the beaches are covered with white sand like Florida. I think we're close to being done with our chat. It's been pleasant and thanks again for agreeing to donate.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yeah they are pretty white. Florida's beaches are slightly better though. It has been great chatting with you!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Have a good night.
